name: Adam Klie
program: Eric and Wendy Schmidt AI in Science Postdoctoral Fellow
bio: Adam is a Schmidt AI in Science Postdoctoral Fellow. Adam's research interests are in building models of gene regulation. Adam also spent two years abroad playing professional basketball and in his spare time enjoys exercising and playing guitar.
education: B.S. in Bioengineering: Bioinformatics, 2017 UC San Diego
Ph.D. in Bioinformatics & Systems Biology, 2023 UC San Diego
